fullname: Prophet Muḥammad, peace and blessings be upon him

info: A child companion who befriended, served, and observed the Prophet ﷺ since the Hijrah, when he was 10 years old, and grew up to be a prominent narrator of hadith

fullname: Nasībah bint al-Ḥārith Um ʿAṭiyyah al-Anṣāriyyah
searchname: Nasibah bint al-Harith Um Atiyyah al-Ansariyyah
info: The woman who helped Ḥafṣah bint ʿUmar wash the body of Zaynab, the daughter of the Prophet ﷺ

fullname: Salmān ibn ʿĀmir ibn Aws al-Ḍabi
searchname: Salman ibn Amir ibn Aws al-Dabi
notes: I'm pretty sure he's Rabab's uncle bc the page for Rabab (http://muslimscholars.info/manage2.php?submit=scholar&ID=19958) says that her uncle's name is Salim ibn Amir al-Dhabi and the info for this person's scholar page (http://muslimscholars.info/manage.php?submit=scholar&ID=5068) says that al-Dhabi is in his name too

info: A prominent 8th century scholar and hadith narrator and brother of Ḥafṣah bint Sīrīn.

fullname: Um al-Huthayl Ḥafṣah bint Sīrīn al-Anṣāriyyah
searchname: Um al-Huthayl Hafsah bint Sirin al-Ansariyyah
info: 8th century jurist, scholar, ascetic, and sister of the famous scholar Muḥammad ibn Sīrīn
notes: maybe mention that quote from nadwi's book about someone who preferred her hadiths to her brother's

fullname: Hishām ibn ʿUrwah ibn az-Zubayr ibn al-ʿAwwām
searchname: Hisham ibn Urwah ibn az-Zubayr ibn al-Awwam
info: Son of ʿUrwah ibn al-Zubayr and great-nephew of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr

fullname: Um al-Rāʾiḥ Al-Rabāb bint Ṣulayʿ al-Ḍabiyyah

info: 8th century jurist, author, ascetic, and hafiẓ
Son of ʿUrwah ibn al-Zubayr and great-nephew of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr
